alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued March 13 at 3:25PM HST until March 15 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM HST TUESDAY... .A new northwest swell will bring advisory level surf to the Aloha State. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT AND WHERE...Large breaking waves of 14 to 18 feet along north and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai and north facing shores of Oahu, Molokai and Maui. Large breaking waves of 10 to 14 feet along west facing shores of Oahu and Molokai. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
